mInstalledModules.key: svo (install, config, pipes, rift, parry, prios)

Trigger.name: Health Sip
Trigger.script: zgui.sendLogger("green", "Health Sipped")

regexCodeList.string: The elixir heals and soothes you.

Trigger.name: Mana Sip
Trigger.script: zgui.sendLogger("blue", "Mana Sipped")

regexCodeList.string: Your mind feels stronger and more alert.

Trigger.name: GMCP Map Catchers
Trigger.script: if not zgui.map then zgui.buildMap() end

regexCodeList.string: return gmcp.Room

Trigger.name: GMCP Rooms
Trigger.script: if zgui.map.current ~= "Mapper" then zgui.map[zgui.map.current]:hide() end zgui.map.current = "Mapper" zgui.map["Mapper"]:show() zgui.ship = zgui.ship or {} zgui.shipmode = false

regexCodeList.string: return gmcp.Room.Info.num < 2121028
return gmcp.Room.Info.num > 0

Trigger.name: GMCP Wilderness
Trigger.script: if zgui.map.current ~= "Wilderness" then zgui.map[zgui.map.current]:hide() end zgui.map.current = "Wilderness" zgui.map["Wilderness"]:show() zgui.ship = zgui.ship or {} zgui.shipmode = false

regexCodeList.string: return gmcp.Room.Info.num > 2121028
return gmcp.Room.Info.coords==""

Trigger.name: Catch All
Trigger.script: selectCurrentLine() copy() appendBuffer("Wilderness") deleteLine()

Trigger.name: GMCP Oceans
Trigger.script: if zgui.map.current ~= "Ocean" then zgui.map[zgui.map.current]:hide() end zgui.map.current = "Ocean" zgui.map["Ocean"]:show() zgui.ship = zgui.ship or {} zgui.shipmode = true

regexCodeList.string: return gmcp.Room.Info.environment=='Vessel'
return gmcp.Room.Info.num==-2

Trigger.name: Catch All
Trigger.script: selectCurrentLine() copy() appendBuffer("Ocean") deleteLine()

Trigger.name: Ship Room Detected

regexCodeList.string: The ship moves
The ship drifts

Trigger.name: Ally Start
Trigger.script: zgui.allies = {} enableTrigger("AllyReport")

regexCodeList.string: You have the following allies:

Trigger.name: Ally End
Trigger.script: zgui.showAllies() disableTrigger("AllyReport") --allyString = table.concat(zgui.allies, ", ") --send("pt My Allies: "..allyString)

regexCodeList.string: ^You have currently used (\w+) ally slots of your (\w+) maximum.$

Trigger.name: AllyReport
Trigger.script: table.insert(zgui.allies, 1, matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^You feel an unusually strong lust for (\w+).$
^(\w+) is an ally.$
^(\w+) is an ally \(M\).$
^You feel an unusually strong lust for (\w+) \(M\).$

Trigger.name: No Allies
Trigger.script: zgui.allies = {} zgui.showAllies()

regexCodeList.string: With an indignant grunt, you remove everyone from your list of allies.
You have no allies.

Trigger.name: Add Ally
Trigger.script: table.insert(zgui.allies, 1, matches[2]) zgui.showAllies()

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) is now one of your allies.$

Trigger.name: Remove Ally
Trigger.script: local removeThisAlly = table.index_of(zgui.allies, matches[2]) table.remove(zgui.allies, removeThisAlly) zgui.showAllies()

regexCodeList.string: ^You declare that (\w+) will no longer be one of your allies.$

Trigger.name: Enemy Start
Trigger.script: zgui.enemies = {} enableTrigger("EnemyReport")

regexCodeList.string: ^You have the following enemies:$

Trigger.name: Enemy End
Trigger.script: zgui.showEnemies() disableTrigger("EnemyReport")

regexCodeList.string: ^You have currently used (\d+) enemy slots of your (\d+) maximum.$
^You have currently used (\d+) enemy slot of your (\d+) maximum.$

Trigger.name: EnemyReport
Trigger.script: table.insert(zgui.enemies, 1, matches[2])

Trigger.name: No Enemies

regexCodeList.string: You have no enemies.
In a moment of forgiveness, you declare that you have no enemies.

Trigger.name: Add Enemy
Trigger.script: table.insert(zgui.enemies, 1, matches[2]) zgui.showEnemies()

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) is now one of your enemies.$

Trigger.name: Remove Enemy
Trigger.script: local removeThisEnemy = table.index_of(zgui.enemies, matches[2]) table.remove(zgui.enemies, removeThisEnemy) zgui.showEnemies()

regexCodeList.string: ^You declare that (\w+) will no longer be one of your enemies.$

Trigger.name: wsys balance prompt
Trigger.script: if zgui.balances and wsys then zgui.showBals() end

Trigger.name: Who here
Trigger.script: zgui.whoRoomList={} enableTrigger("whoHereCatch")

regexCodeList.string: You see the following people here:

Trigger.name: whoHereCatch
Trigger.script: local tempI = 0 for k,v in pairs(mmp.pdb_lastupdate) do tempI = tempI + 1 zgui.whoRoomList[tempI] = k end tempI = 0 disableTrigger("whoHereCatch")

Trigger.name: Got Prompt
Trigger.script: if zgui.prompt then selectCurrentLine() copy() appendBuffer("myPrompt") end

Trigger.name: Enemy Afflictions Update
Trigger.script: if ak then zgui.showTarAffs() end

Trigger.name: Log In
Trigger.script: zgui.running = false

regexCodeList.string: Your last login was from domain

Trigger.name: Log Out
Trigger.script: Adjustable.Container:saveAll("default") zgui.windows = "default" zgui.echo("Saving zGUI Window Layout As: default")

regexCodeList.string: You grow still and begin to silently pray for preservation of your soul while you are out of the land.

Trigger.name: Death Cape Growing
Trigger.script: deleteLine() if not zgui.cape then zgui.buildCape() end if zgui.cape then zgui.renewCape() end

regexCodeList.string: You feel a surge of energy course through your body as a sycophantic shoulder cape feeds upon the lifeforce of your fallen foe.

Trigger.name: Rage Gains
Trigger.script: deleteFull()

regexCodeList.string: You must wait a short time before you can use a battlerage ability again.

Trigger.name: Battlerage Skill Ready
Trigger.script: if string.lower(matches[2]) == zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][2][1] then zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][2][5] = 1 end if string.lower(matches[2]) == zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][3][1] then zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][3][5] = 1 end if string.lower(matches[2]) == zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][4][1] then zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][4][5] = 1 end if string.lower(matches[2]) == zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][5][1] then zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][5][5] = 1 end if string.lower(matches[2]) == zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][6][1] then zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][6][5] = 1 end if string.lower(matches[2]) == zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][7][1] then zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][7][5] = 1 end deleteFull()

regexCodeList.string: ^Your (.*) ability could be used again but you lack the necessary Rage.$
^You can use (.*) again.$

Trigger.name: Can Use Rage Skils Again
Trigger.script: deleteFull()

regexCodeList.string: ^You can use another Battlerage ability again, but none of your abilities are currently available.$

Trigger.name: Rage Fade
Trigger.script: deleteFull()

regexCodeList.string: ^Your rage fades away.$

Trigger.name: Lightning (1)
Trigger.script: zgui.rage1SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You call down a lightning bolt to destroy (.*).$

Trigger.name: Pressure(4)
Trigger.script: zgui.rage4SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You send a crushing wave of pressurised air at (.*), pulverising (\w+).$

Trigger.name: Miasma (1 alchemist)
Trigger.script: zgui.rage1SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You quickly mix together several chemical by\-products and fling the toxic mixture into (.+)\t's face\, causing (him|her) to cough and choke\.$

Trigger.name: Cadmium (2 alchemist)
Trigger.script: zgui.rage2SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You sketch a bisected triangle in the air and direct the energy of cadmium to pierce (.+)\'s skin\, weakening (him|her)\.$

Trigger.name: Caustic (3 alchemist)
Trigger.script: zgui.rage3SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You mix together the ingredients of the caustic chemical and fling it at .+\'s shield\, watching as it is consumed\.$

Trigger.name: Magnesium (4 alchemist)
Trigger.script: zgui.rage4SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You sketch out the symbol for magnesium and direct the energy of iron to sear (.+)\'s flesh\.$

Trigger.name: Pathogen (5 alchemist)
Trigger.script: zgui.rage5SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You quickly combine and throw the virulent pathogen at (.+)\. The chemical seeps through (his|her) skin but (he|she) is able to fight off the worst of its effects\.$
^You quickly combine and throw the virulent pathogen at (.+)\. The chemical seeps through (his|her) skin and wreaks havoc on (his|her) weakened regeneration\.$

Trigger.name: Hypnotic (6 alchemist)
Trigger.script: zgui.rage6SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^Taking care to avoid the fumes\, you quickly form the hypnotic chemical and throw it into (.+)\'s face\.$

Trigger.name: Moulinet
Trigger.script: zgui.rage1SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You twist your wrist swiftly\, slicing (.+) with a long slash of your sweeping blade\.$

Trigger.name: Trill
Trigger.script: zgui.rage2SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You direct your voice in a high\-pitched trill at (.+)\, dazing (him|her)\.$

Trigger.name: Resonance
Trigger.script: zgui.rage3SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You hum a low note at .+\, causing (?:his|her|its) translucent shield to shatter as it resonates with the power of your voice\.$

Trigger.name: Howlslash
Trigger.script: zgui.rage4SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You use your powerful voice to distract (.+) with a ululating howl before stepping in with a vicious slash\.$

Trigger.name: Cyclone
Trigger.script: zgui.rage5SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^Your careful footwork leads you in a tight spin past .+\, but (?:he|she|it) is able to avoid the worst of your slashing blade\.$
^Your careful footwork leads you in a tight spin past .+\, (?:his|her|its) stunned state preventing (?:him|her|it) from dodging your slashing blade\.$

Trigger.name: Charm
Trigger.script: zgui.rage6SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You direct a soothing song at (.+)\, enticing (him|her) into defending you\.$

Trigger.name: Leapstrike
Trigger.script: zgui.rage1SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^A Shin-enhanced leap flings you high into the air. You extend one knee downwards as you begin to fall, squarely striking (.*) and driving h(im|er) to the ground as you land.$

Trigger.name: Daze
Trigger.script: zgui.rage2SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You hurl a precise blast of Shin energy at (.*) eyes.$

Trigger.name: Shatter
Trigger.script: zgui.rage3SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You unleash a burst of Shin energy at (.*), tearing apart h(is|er) translucent shield.$

Trigger.name: Spinslash
Trigger.script: zgui.rage4SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You twist in a tight circle, slashing (.*) with each spin.$

Trigger.name: Headstrike
Trigger.script: zgui.rage5SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You deliver a glancing blow to (.*) head.$

Trigger.name: Nerveslash
Trigger.script: zgui.rage6SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You lightly stab (.*) in several key locations with your blade, causing h(im|er) to slump weakly.$

Trigger.name: Drain
Trigger.script: zgui.rage1SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You command the shadow of (.*) to begin siphoning away the life of its host.$

Trigger.name: Lash
Trigger.script: zgui.rage2SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You summon whips of shadow to viciously lash the form of (.*).$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage1SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You spit a stream of acidic venom at (.+) who writhes in agony as the spittle seeps into (his|her) skin\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage1SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You form small chunks of ice in your enormous maw\, then spit them at (.+) in a barrage\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage1SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You charge quickly at (.+)\, throwing your mighty form into (him|her) and sending (him|her) staggering back\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage2SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You swing your mighty tail around\, stabbing (.+) with an acid\-covered spine\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage2SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You breathe a column of icy air at (.+)\'s head\, stunning (him|her)\.$

Trigger.name: Deaden (2 gold)
Trigger.script: zgui.rage2SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You psychically slam your mind into (.+)\'s\, deadening (his|her) reactions\.$

Trigger.name: Scour (2 green)
Trigger.script: zgui.rage2SkillUsed()

Trigger.name: Dragontaunt (2 red)
Trigger.script: zgui.rage2SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You slap your tail on the ground while growling at (.+)\, forcing (him|her) to recklessly attack\.$

Trigger.name: Sizzle (2 silver)
Trigger.script: zgui.rage2SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You breathe at (.+)\, small bolts of lightning crackling around (him|her) and sensitizing (his|her) skin\.$

regexCodeList.string: ^You bathe .+\'s translucent shield in your noxious breath\, dissolving it\.$
^.+\'s translucent shield cracks and fades away as you breathe an icy blast at it\.$
^.+\'s translucent shield fades away as you cover it with your deadly wyrmvenom\.$
^You blast .+ with psychic energy\, demolishing (?:his|her|its) translucent shield\.$
^You breathe a white\-hot blast of flame at .+ and burn away (?:his|her|its) translucent shield\.$
^A bolt of lightning cracks out from your maw and obliterates .+\'s translucent shield\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage4SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You barrel into (.+) and knock (him|her) to the ground before stomping over (his|her) prone form\.$

regexCodeList.string: ^You level your draconic gaze at (.+)\, assaulting (him|her) with psychic waves of force\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage4SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You breathe a long torrent of flame at (.+), igniting (his|her) skin\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage4SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You open your cavernous maw and summon a blast of lightning to pulverize (.+)\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage5SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You breathe a wave of icy air at (.+)\.$

regexCodeList.string: ^You summon a psychic storm around (.+)\, but (he|she) stands strong against the buffeting winds\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage5SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^Positioning your mighty head over (.+)\, you let your acidic saliva flow over (him|her)\. (He|She) screams in agony as some of the poison splashes over (him|her)\.$

Trigger.name: Flamebath (5 red)
Trigger.script: zgui.rage5SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You blast (.+) with a bath of flame\, but (he|she) is able to avoid the brunt of the blast\.$

Trigger.name: Stormflare (5 silver)

^You breathe a series of lightning strikes in a lattice around (.+)\.(\s+)(He|She) absent\-mindedly strides into the lattice as the lightning crackles into (his|her) skin\.$

^You open your gigantic maw and spew acid on (.+)\. (She|He) is too clumsy to dodge the deluge and is coated in the corrosive slime\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage6SkillUsed()

Trigger.script: zgui.rage6SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You let loose a steady stream of cold air around (.+)\, who begins to shiver uncontrollably\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage6SkillUsed()

Trigger.script: zgui.rage1SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^Gesturing at (.*), you whisper a prayer to Gaia, the Earthmother. Rising in response to your incantation, vines burst forth from the very earth to strangle (her|him).$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage2SkillUsed()

Trigger.script: zgui.rage3SkillUsed()

Trigger.script: zgui.rage4SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You hold your quarterstaff aloft and focus a beam of intense sunlight on the stunned form of (.+) who hastily averts (his|her) eyes before any significant damage can be done to them\.$
^You hold your quarterstaff aloft and focus a beam of intense sunlight on (.+)\. Foolishly\, (.+) stares straight at the dazzling light and screams as (his|her) eyes are seared\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage6SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You cause the tip of your quarterstaff to glow brightly before thrusting it at the face of (.+)\. (.+) recoils from the blinding light and begins to stagger about clumsily\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage1SkillUsed()

Trigger.script: zgui.rage2SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You summon a polar vortex in a tight field around (.*)\, chilling the small pocket so intensely that time itself begins to slow\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage3SkillUsed()

Trigger.script: zgui.rage4SkillUsed()

^You raise your hands dramatically and summon a mighty flaming rock from the sky that slams into the clumsy form of (.*)\.$

Trigger.script: zgui.rage4SkillUsed()

regexCodeList.string: ^You unleash a ferocious onslaught on .+?, relentlessly pounding (?:him|her) with .+?\.$

Trigger.name: Harvested
Trigger.script:
--deleteLine() if matches[3] then zTrade.echo(matches[2].." : "..matches[3]) elseif matches[2] then zTrade.echo("1 : "..matches[2]) else zTrade.echo("1 : Elm") end
if zTrade.autoHarvesting and #zTrade.harvest > 0 then table.remove(zTrade.harvest, 1) if #zTrade.harvest > 0 then zTrade.harvesting() elseif zTrade.autoGathering and #zTrade.gather > 0 then zTrade.gathering() end elseif zTrade.autoGathering and #zTrade.gather > 0 then table.remove(zTrade.gather, 1) if #zTrade.gather > 0 then zTrade.gathering() elseif zTrade.autoHarvesting and #zTrade.harvest > 0 then zTrade.harvesting() end end if #zTrade.harvest < 1 then zTrade.echo("Room Harvest DONE") end

Trigger.name: Pressure
Trigger.script:
ak = ak or {} ak.duress = ak.duress or {} ak.duress.pressurescore = affstrack.score.disloyalty + affstrack.score.manaleech + affstrack.score.deadening
if ak.duress.pressurescore < 200 then ak.duress.pressure = ak.duress.pressure + 1 else ak.duress.pressure = ak.duress.pressure + 2 end ak.scoreup(matches[2]) cecho("\n<cyan>Pressure lvl: <yellow>"..ak.duress.pressure)

Trigger.name: Pressure eats
Trigger.script:
ak = ak or {} ak.duress = ak.duress or {}
if target == matches[2] and ak.duress.pressure > 0 then ak.duress.pressure = ak.duress.pressure - 1 cecho("\n<cyan>Pressure lvl: <yellow>"..ak.duress.pressure) ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

Trigger.name: Stat Evals
Trigger.script:
if matches[3] == "health" then ak.currenthealth = tonumber(matches[4]) ak.maxhealth = tonumber(matches[5]) ak.healthpercent = ak.currenthealth / ak.maxhealth * 100 cecho("<green>"..ak.healthpercent.."%") ak.knownmaxhealth[target] = tonumber(matches[5]) elseif matches[3] == "mana" then ak.currentmana = tonumber(matches[4]) ak.maxmana = tonumber(matches[5]) ak.manapercent = ak.currentmana / ak.maxmana * 100 cecho("<blue>"..ak.manapercent.."%") end
if ak.healthpercent <= 60 and ak.manapercent <= 60 then send("queue prepend eqbal aurify " .. target) end

regexCodeList.string: ^(His|Her) (health|mana) is at (\d+) out of (\d+).$

Trigger.name: No Humours
Trigger.script: ak.alchemist.humour.sanguine = 0 ak.alchemist.humour.choleric = 0 ak.alchemist.humour.melancholic = 0 ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic = 0

regexCodeList.string: His humours are all at normal levels.
Her humours are all at normal levels.

Trigger.name: Prompt
Trigger.script: ak.scoreup(target)

Trigger.name: Copper
Trigger.script: ak.defs.shield = false ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: Drawing upon the latent alchemical energies, you sketch out a symbol in the air with your finger in the shape of two overlapping hexagons.

Trigger.name: HomunGerminated
Trigger.script: wsys.unpause()

regexCodeList.string: The growing nucleus begins taking a humanoid form,

Trigger.name: Phleg
Trigger.script:
local aff = "weariness anorexia slickness lethargy"
if ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic < 4 then aff = "lethargy" elseif ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic < 6 then aff = "lethargy anorexia" elseif ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic < 7 then aff = "lethargy anorexia slickness" end if matches[2] == target then OppGainedAff(aff) end ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic = 0

regexCodeList.string: ^You inundate ([\w'\-]+)\'s phlegmatic humour\, and (his|her) eyes grow vacant\.$

Trigger.name: Ate For Humour
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.alchemist.humour.sanguine = ak.alchemist.humour.sanguine - 1 ak.alchemist.humour.choleric = ak.alchemist.humour.choleric - 1 ak.alchemist.humour.melancholic = ak.alchemist.humour.melancholic - 1 ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic = ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic - 1 end if ak.alchemist.humour.sanguine < 0 then ak.alchemist.humour.sanguine = 0 end if ak.alchemist.humour.choleric < 0 then ak.alchemist.humour.choleric = 0 end if ak.alchemist.humour.melancholic < 0 then ak.alchemist.humour.melancholic = 0 end if ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic < 0 then ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic = 0 end ak.scoreup(matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) eats a ginger root\.$
^([\w'\-]+) eats an antimony flake\.$

Trigger.name: Corruption
Trigger.script: if target == matches[2] then OppGainedAff("corruption") corrtimer = tempTimer(45, [[OppLostAff("corruption")]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Channeling your focus through your link to your homunculus, you reach out to find the ethereal hook for (\w+)'s humours.

Trigger.name: Corruption cured
Trigger.script: if target == matches[2] then OppLostAff("corruption") end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) looks far healthier all of a sudden\.$

Trigger.name: Stared
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if nextcurse then if nextcurse == "breach" then elseif nextcurse == "sicken" then if affstrack.score.paralysis < 100 then nextcurse = "paralysis" elseif affstrack.score.healthleech < 100 then nextcurse = "manaleech" else nextcurse = "slickness" end elseif nextcurse == "plague" then nextcurse = "voyria" elseif nextcurse == "clumsy" then nextcurse = "clumsiness" elseif nextcurse == "dizzy" then nextcurse = "dizziness" elseif nextcurse == "stupid" then nextcurse = "stupidity" elseif nextcurse == "vomiting" then nextcurse = "nausea" elseif nextcurse == "reckless" then nextcurse = "recklessness" end OppGainedAff(nextcurse) nextcurse = nil return end if nextcurse2 then if nextcurse2 == "breach" then elseif nextcurse2 == "sicken" then if affstrack.score.paralysis < 100 then nextcurse2 = "paralysis" elseif affstrack.score.healthleech < 100 then nextcurse2 = "manaleech" else nextcurse2 = "slickness" end elseif nextcurse2 == "plague" then nextcurse2 = "voyria" elseif nextcurse2 == "clumsy" then nextcurse2 = "clumsiness" elseif nextcurse2 == "dizzy" then nextcurse2 = "dizziness" elseif nextcurse2 == "stupid" then nextcurse2 = "stupidity" elseif nextcurse2 == "vomiting" then nextcurse2 = "nausea" elseif nextcurse2 == "reckless" then nextcurse2 = "recklessness" end OppGainedAff(nextcurse2) nextcurse2 = nil end

regexCodeList.string: You stare at ([\w'\-]+), giving [\w'\-]+ the evil eye\.$

Trigger.name: Sicken
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.paralysis ~= 100 then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("paralysis") affstrack.score.paralysis = 100 affstrack.score.slickness = 100 affstrack.score.manaleech = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) else affstrack.score.paralysis = 100 affstrack.score.slickness = 100 affstrack.score.manaleech = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) doubles over\, eyes bulging\.$

TriggerGroup.name: Bard Group
TriggerGroup.script:
-- --Everything that follows was originally written by Klendathu
--I have mildly modified portions of be more up to date with my current offense tracking system, --while attempting to leave the majority of it in place so he has to do very little to maintain --continued functionality. If you are a using this section, I strongly encourage you to make sure --to spend a few extra seconds and drop him a thank you.
--Thank you.

Trigger.name: Pesante fired
Trigger.script: tunesmithing = "none" if affstrack.score.deaf < 100 then affstrack.score.deaf = 100 ak.scoreup(target) end

regexCodeList.string: The songblessing unleashes a stunning percussive blast.
The songblessing unleashes a strident note.

Trigger.name: Check tunesmithing
Trigger.script: tunesmithing = multimatches[2][2]

regexCodeList.string: A soft, haunting melody emanates from this blade.
^It has been tunesmithed with the power of the ([\w'\-]+)\.
It weighs about 10 pounds.

Trigger.name: Tunesmithing
Trigger.script: tunesmithing = matches[2]

regexCodeList.string: ^You weave strands of melodies over your blade, tunesmithing it with the power of the ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Martellato fired
Trigger.script: tunesmithing = "none"

regexCodeList.string: The songblessing upon the rapier swells with a rich, vibrant hum.

Trigger.name: Acciaccatura fired
Trigger.script: tunesmithing = "none" if ak.ai() then return end --ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then local smashlimb = ak.limbs.standardizeLimb(matches[3]) if affstrack.score[smashlimb] < 100 then OppGainedAff(smashlimb) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^A bell\-like tone rings out from your songblessed rapier\, echoed by the sound of cracking bone as ([\w'\-]+)\'s (left leg|right leg|left arm|right arm) snaps\.$

Trigger.name: Auralbless (undeaf)
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "yourself" then return false end
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.deaf = 100 end

regexCodeList.string: ^You lightly strike the side of ([\w'\-]+)\'s head with your rapier\.$

Trigger.name: Raze rebounding/shield
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if string.find(matches[1], "rebounding") then ak.defs.rebounding = false else ak.defs.shield = false end ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You raze ([\w'\-]+)\'s (aura of rebounding|magical shield) with a rapier carved from living ice\.$

Trigger.name: Bagatelle restored hearing
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("deaf") end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) cries out with a look of surprise as the Bagatelle restores (his|her) hearing\.$

Trigger.name: Berceuse stripped insomnia
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.insomnia = 100 end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) drifts away into the soft music of the Berceuse\, abandoning (him|her)self to its soporific tones\.$

Trigger.name: Berceuse sent them to sleep!
Trigger.script: if multimatches[1][2]:lower() == target:lower() then if affstrack.score.prone < 100 then OppGainedAff("prone sleep") else OppGainedAff("sleep") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+)\'s eyes close suddenly as (s|)he falls asleep\.$
^([\w'\-]+) drifts away into the soft music of the Berceuse\, abandoning (him|her)self to its soporific tones\.$

Trigger.name: Maqam (Clumsiness)
Trigger.script: ak.songoff = true if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.clumsiness == 100 then OppGainedAff("Dizziness") else OppGainedAff("Clumsiness") end else ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You sing a graceful maqam of el\'Jazira at ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^The songbird upon your shoulder sings a graceful maqam of el\'Jazira at ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.script: ak.songoff = true if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("Confusion") else ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

^The songbird upon your shoulder perfectly mimics the recitation of an obscure Kamleikan haiku to ([\w'\-]+)\.$

regexCodeList.string: ^In droning song you subject ([\w'\-]+) to a lengthy isorhythm\.$
^The songbird upon your shoulder launches into a droning song\, subjecting ([\w'\-]+) to a lengthy isorhythm\.$

^The songbird upon your shoulder sings out a poem of gluttony and decay that makes ([\w'\-]+) green in the cheeks\.$

^The songbird upon your shoulder sings a pastorale of the fields and streams to ([\w'\-]+)\.$

^The songbird upon your shoulder twitters an irritating\, mind\-numbing ditty at ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Requiem (Paranoia)
Trigger.script: ak.songoff = true if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("Paranoia") else ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^With a mournful cry you begin the requiem for Seleucar to ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^With a mournful cry\, the songbird upon your shoulder begins the requiem for Seleucar to ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Epic (Paralysis)

^The songbird upon your shoulder begins to perfectly mimic the recitation of an epic tale of the heroism of Nicator to ([\w'\-]+)\, holding (him|her) spellbound\.$

regexCodeList.string: ^You sing a sonorous chant\, stripping the ([\w'\-]+) defence of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Cantata (breaks shield)
Trigger.script:
ak.songoff = true selectCurrentLine() fg("GreenYellow") deselect() resetFormat()
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.defs.rebounding = false ak.defs.shield = false ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your cantata shatters the defences surrounding ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^Your cantata shatters the magical shield surrounding (.+)\.$

Trigger.name: Dwinnu (breaks bonds)
Trigger.script: ak.songoff = true selectCurrentLine() fg("GreenYellow") deselect() resetFormat()

regexCodeList.string: 'DWINNU! DWINNU!' you chant urgently as your bonds turn to dust.

Trigger.name: Voicecraft failed due to deafness
Trigger.script: ak.songoff = true cecho("\n <white>--== TARGET IS DEAF ==--<reset>") if not matches[2] or IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.deaf = 0 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You sing a graceful maqam of el\'Jazira at ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems unmoved\.$
^You sense futility as you recite an obscure Kamleikan haiku to ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^In droning song you subject ([\w'\-]+) to a lengthy isorhythm\, without results\.$
^Weaving a complex counterpoint between instrument and voice\, you fail to instill anything like fear in ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^You invoke chaotic powers in a dark solo but fail to drain the essential magic of ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^You direct a poem of gluttony and decay at ([\w'\-]+)\, without success\.$
^You sing a pastorale of the fields and streams to ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems not to notice\.$
^You chant \'GIMMEGIMME\' at ([\w'\-]+)\, who does not react\.$
^You sing an irritating\, mind\-numbing ditty at ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems curiously unaffected\.$
^With a mournful cry you begin the requiem for Seleucar to ([\w'\-]+)\, who appears unmoved\.$
^Using a heavy tremolo you sing\, uselessly\, aiming at ([\w'\-]+)\'s (left|right) leg\.$
^With a frustratingly irrelevant vibrato you aim at ([\w'\-]+)\'s (left|right) arm\.$
^Your recitation of an epic tale of the heroism of Nicator has no effect on ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^With a wink\, you recite \"Ode to Elixirs\" to ([\w'\-]+)\, who looks on\, unimpressed\.$
^Starting with the characteristic Jaziran trill\, you sing a qasida of asceticism to ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems undaunted\.$
^With a gravity born of respect\, you sing of the saintly Imithia\, if only for yourself\.$
^Composing a few clever lines in your head\, you quickly sing a jaunty limerick at ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems to pay no notice\.$
^You sing a sonorous chant which fails to strip the defences of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Cantata no shield / rebounding
Trigger.script: ak.songoff = true if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.defs.rebounding = false ak.defs.shield = false ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You let the grace of your voice shine forth with a Scarlattan cantata at (.+)\.$

Trigger.name: Dirge (banish gravehands)
Trigger.script: ak.songoff = true selectCurrentLine() fg("GreenYellow") deselect() resetFormat()

regexCodeList.string: With an unearthly dirge, you banish the hands that reach from the grave.

Trigger.script: ak.songoff = false ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: You have recovered voice balance.

Trigger.name: Tremolo
Trigger.script: ak.limbs.ScoreRun = true ak.limbs.LimbHit(multimatches[2][2],"Me", "tremolo", multimatches[2][3].."leg")

regexCodeList.string: Using a heavy tremolo you brutally punish
^Using a heavy tremolo you brutally punish ([\w'\-]+)\'s already shattered ([\w'\-]+) leg\.$

Trigger.name: Martellato
Trigger.script: OppGainedAff("Prone")

regexCodeList.string: The songblessing upon the rapier swells with a rich, vibrant hum.

Trigger.name: Hearts-Fury Counter
Trigger.script: enableTrigger("Confirmed Counter Hit")

regexCodeList.string: Full of controlled rage you lash out in a counterstrike.

Trigger.name: Riposte Parry
Trigger.script: enableTrigger("Confirmed Counter Hit")

regexCodeList.string: Lightning-quick, you flick your blade out in riposte.

Trigger.name: Confirmed Counter Hit
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("Confirmed Counter Hit") if target == matches[3] then enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE! if weaponattack == nil then weaponattack = {} end table.insert(weaponattack, matches[2]) end --display(weaponattack)

regexCodeList.string: ^You bring (.*) crashing down on ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("weariness") end

regexCodeList.string: ^With a fluid motion, you aim a blow just below ([\w'\-]+)'s shoulder.$
^Lunging forward with practised grace, you strike at the back of ([\w'\-]+)'s (right|left) hand.$

Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("clumsiness") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Lashing out with open palms, you box ([\w'\-]+)\'s ears.$

Trigger.name: Nose
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("disloyalty") end

regexCodeList.string: ^With the heel of your palm\, you send a pulverising blow at ([\w'\-]+)\'s nose.$

Trigger.name: Chin
Trigger.script: --gz.landed_venom("delphinium")

Trigger.name: Void Fist
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("voidfist") if voidtimer then killTimer(voidtimer) end if ak.limbs.blademaster.stance["Me"] == "Sanya" then voidtimer = tempTimer(20, [[OppLostAff("voidfist")]]) else voidtimer = tempTimer(15, [[OppLostAff("voidfist")]]) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Emptying your mind of conscious thought, you welcome the void as you strike ([\w'\-]+) a hollow blow\.$

Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("airfist") if airfisttimer then killTimer(airfisttimer) end if ak.limbs.blademaster.stance["Me"] == "Thyr" then airfisttimer = tempTimer(19.5, [[OppLostAff("airfist")]]) else airfisttimer = tempTimer(14.5, [[OppLostAff("airfist")]]) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Freeing your mind to the unpredictable dance of the wind\, you hurl a blow towards ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Vitiate
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("vitiate") end

regexCodeList.string: Thrusting at ([\w'\-]+)'s chest with a blade hand outstretched, you release an unmitigated torrent of Shin energy upon h(?:im|er), and (he|she) crumples helplessly\.$

Trigger.name: Hamstring
Trigger.script:
--Seriously? You're worried about hamstring?
if IsTargetted(matches[3]) then OppGainedAff("hamstring") end

regexCodeList.string: His eyes dark and expression blank, [\w'\-]+ strikes ([\w'\-]+) a hollow blow.
^Minute bolts of lightning arc across ([\w'\-]+)\'s skin\.$

Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[3]) then OppGainedAff("impaleslash") if impaleslashtimer then killTimer(impaleslashtimer);impaleslashtimer = nil end impaleslashtimer = tempTimer(30, [[OppLostAff("impaleslash")]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^(.*) steady in your grip, you drag its razor edge across arteries within ([\w'\-]+)'s abdomen\.$

Trigger.name: Reap
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(multimatches[2][2]) then enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE! weaponattack = weaponattack or {} table.insert(weaponattack, multimatches[2][3]) end

^You lay into ([\w'\-]+) with a vicious blow from (.+)\.$

Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(multimatches[2][2]) then OppGainedAff(multimatches[2][3]) end

^You determine that ([\w'\-]+) is suffering from ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Attuned Target
Trigger.script:

Fired!") if matches[2] == target:lower():title() then ak.attuned = true enableTrigger("Unattuned Target") attunetimer = tempTimer(160, [[ ak.attuned = false if svo then svo.boxDisplay("Target Unattuned", "red:black") end ]]) end

Trigger.name: Hamstring
Trigger.script:
if IsTargetted(matches[3]) then local smashlimb = matches[2].."leg" ak.limbs.LimbHit(matches[3], "Me", "psion", smashlimb, "percent") if affstrack.score[smashlimb] < 100 then OppGainedAff(smashlimb) end if IsTargetted(matches[3]) and affstrack.score.haemophilia > 0 then local bleedr = 55 ak.bleeding = ak.bleeding + bleedr cecho(ak.bleeding) ak.scoreup(matches[3]) end end
-- LIMB HIT: leg

regexCodeList.string: ^You duck low, your blade slicing into the (left|right) leg of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Backhand
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("Stupidity") OppGainedAff("Dizziness") ak.limbs.LimbHit(matches[2], "Me", "psion", "head", "percent") end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) and affstrack.score.haemophilia > 0 then local bleedr = 15 ak.bleeding = ak.bleeding + bleedr cecho(ak.bleeding) ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end -- LIMB HIT: head

regexCodeList.string: ^You deliver a savage backhanded blow with a translucent mace to the face of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Sever
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[3]) then local smashlimb = matches[2].."arm" OppGainedAff("Clumsiness") ak.limbs.LimbHit(matches[3], "Me", "psion", smashlimb, "percent") end if IsTargetted(matches[3]) and affstrack.score.haemophilia > 0 then local bleedr = 45 ak.bleeding = ak.bleeding + bleedr cecho(ak.bleeding) ak.scoreup(matches[3]) end -- LIMB HIT: arm

regexCodeList.string: ^With a precise strike you sever the muscles in the (right|left) arm of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Puncture
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[3]) then local smashlimb = matches[2].."arm" ak.limbs.LimbHit(matches[3], "Me", "psion", smashlimb, "percent") OppGainedAff("Weariness") end if IsTargetted(matches[3]) and affstrack.score.haemophilia > 0 then local bleedr = 45 ak.bleeding = ak.bleeding + bleedr cecho(ak.bleeding) ak.scoreup(matches[3]) end -- LIMB HIT: arm

Trigger.name: Curse Add
Trigger.script:
if ak.ai() then return end if not IsTargetted(multimatches[2][2]) then return end ak.bleedincrease = 40 --curse local curse = multimatches[2][3] if curse then curse = curse:lower() if curse ~= "breach" and curse ~= "tzantza" and curse ~= "inflame" then if affstrack.score[curse] then OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "peace" then curse = "pacifism" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "paralyse" then curse = "paralysis" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "plague" then curse = "voyria" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "clumsy" then curse = "clumsiness" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "dizzy" then curse = "dizziness" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "stupid" then curse = "stupidity" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "vomiting" then curse = "nausea" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "reckless" then curse = "recklessness" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "fear" then ak.tumbling = false ak.scoreup(multimatches[2][2]) elseif curse == "bleed" then
else cecho("Unknown Curse <cyan>"..curse) end end end if ak.shaman and ak.shaman.pararedo and ak.shaman.pararedo == "init" then ak.shaman.pararedo = true elseif ak.shaman and ak.shaman.pararedo then ak.shaman.pararedo = false end

Trigger.name: Jinx
Trigger.script:
if ak.ai() then return end local conversion = { ["paralyse"] = "paralysis", ["plague"] = "voyria", ["clumsy"] = "clumsiness", ["dizzy"] = "dizziness", ["stupid"] = "stupidity", ["vomiting"] = "nausea", ["reckless"] = "recklessness", ["nausea"] = "nausea",
} ak.bleedincrease = 80 local setter = "" ak.shaman.jinx = false ak.jinxcount = ak.jinxcount - 1 if matches[2] ~= "breach" and matches[2] ~= "tzantza" then if table.contains(conversion,matches[2]) then setter = setter.." "..conversion[matches[2]] else setter = setter.." "..matches[2] end end if matches[3] ~= "breach" and matches[3] ~= "tzantza" then if table.contains(conversion,matches[3]) then setter = setter.." "..conversion[matches[3]] else setter = setter.." "..matches[3] end end if matches[2] == "tzantza" or matches[3] == "tzantza" then ak.tzantzajinxed = true end OppGainedAff(setter)

regexCodeList.string: Your malign power may be unleashed in the form of a jinx against your victim.
^[\w'\-]+ writhes in agony as steam begins rising from [\w'\-]+ skin\.$

Trigger.name: Relapsing
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end cecho("<LawnGreen>\nRelapsed!") ak.shaman.relapse = false ak.shaman.Relapseaff = matches[2] local currentrelapse = matches[2] if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed(currentrelapse) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You manipulate the ([\w'\-]+) affliction affecting ([\w'\-]+), altering it to relapse at a later time.$

Trigger.name: Relapsed
Trigger.script: ak.shaman.Relapseaff = "none" OppGainedAff(matches[3])

regexCodeList.string: ^You sense the insidious power of Syvis strike down ([\w'\-]+) with ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Arius
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[2]) and affstrack.score.deaf == 100 then EchoForMajorAff("PRONE") OppGainedAff("prone disrupt") end

regexCodeList.string: ^A terrible cold fills your chest\, constricting your lungs\. Your mouth falls open and an unearthly\, terrible roar emanates forth at ([\w'\-]+)\.$

TriggerGroup.name: Sword & Board Group
TriggerGroup.script:
-- --Everything that follows was originally written by Klendathu
--I have mildly modified portions of be more up to date with my current offense tracking system, --while attempting to leave the majority of it in place so he has to do very little to maintain --continued functionality. If you are a using this section, I strongly encourage you to make sure --to spend a few extra seconds and drop him a thank you.
--Thank you.

Trigger.name: Trip
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end boardaffs = boardaffs or {} local aff = "prone" if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then table.insert(boardaffs, aff) end enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE!

regexCodeList.string: ^You duck low and smash your shield into the knees of ([\w'\-]+), causing them to buckle underneath (him|her)\.$

Trigger.name: Drive
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end boardaffs = boardaffs or {} local aff = "asthma" if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then table.insert(boardaffs, aff) end enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE!

regexCodeList.string: ^Planting your feet\, you drive the edge of your shield with vicious precision into the throat of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Smash Low
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end boardaffs = boardaffs or {} local aff = "clumsiness" if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then table.insert(boardaffs, aff) end enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE!

regexCodeList.string: ^You smash the edge of .* into the kneecaps of ([\w'\-]+), causing (him|her) to stumble\.$

Trigger.name: Smash Mid
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end boardaffs = boardaffs or {} local aff = "paralysis" if IsTargetted(matches[2])then table.insert(boardaffs, aff) end enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE!

regexCodeList.string: ^You quickly lunge to the side\, bringing your shield around to smash into the spine of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Smash High (In Progress{Please Submit if You Complete}]
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end boardaffs = boardaffs or {} if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then table.insert(boardaffs, "HIGH") end enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE!

regexCodeList.string: ^You swing your shield around\, smashing the temple of ([\w'\-]+) with a backhanded blow\.$

Trigger.name: Strike Low
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = 0

regexCodeList.string: ^You lunge downward, slamming the edge of .+ into the shins of ([\w'\-]+)\.

Trigger.name: Strike Mid
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end boardaffs = boardaffs or {} local aff = "sensitivity" affstrack.ferocity = 0 if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then table.insert(boardaffs, aff) end enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE!

regexCodeList.string: ^You draw .* back\, then lunge forward with a savage strike to the ribs of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Strike High
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = 0

regexCodeList.string: ^You spin in a quick circle\, using the momentum to savagely strike the chin of ([\w'\-]+) with the edge of .*\.$

Trigger.name: Ferocity 1
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = 1

regexCodeList.string: You batter at your enemy's defences, seeking an opening.

Trigger.name: Ferocity 2
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = 2

regexCodeList.string: The strength of your blows continues to rise as you hammer at your enemy.

Trigger.name: Ferocity 3
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = 3

regexCodeList.string: The ferocity of battle drives you to yet greater heights.

Trigger.name: Ferocity 4
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = 4

regexCodeList.string: The ferocity of your blows renders any defence useless against you.

Trigger.name: Ferocity Decay 1
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = affstrack.ferocity or 0 affstrack.ferocity = affstrack.ferocity - 1 if affstrack.ferocity < 0 then affstrack.ferocity = 0 end ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: Your ferocity decreases.

Trigger.name: Ferocity Decay All
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = 0 ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: You have lost all of your gained ferocity.
Your attacks lack sufficient ferocity to carry out such an attack.

Trigger.name: Static (paralysis)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("paralysis") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Channeling arcane power through your air and earth channels, you summon forth a burst of arcane static directed at ([\w'\-]+).$

Trigger.name: Thunderclap (sensitivity)
Trigger.script: local aff = "sensitivity" if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff(aff) if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("paralysis") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Channeling large quantities of arcane power through your air channel, you direct a localised explosion of pure sound at ([\w'\-]+)

Trigger.name: Flash (unblind)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("blind") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Summoning forth power through your air and earth channels, you conjure forth a brilliant flash of light at ([\w'\-]+), who blinks rapidly.$

Trigger.name: Flash (transfix)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("transfixed") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Summoning forth power through your air and earth channels, you conjure forth a brilliant flash of light at ([\w'\-]+), who freezes in place.$

Trigger.name: Razorwind (healthleech)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("healthleech") if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("asthma") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Tapping into your air channel, you summon forth a vicious wind to lacerate the body of ([\w'\-]+).$

Trigger.name: Cyclone (dizziness)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("dizziness") if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("asthma") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Summoning forth energy that you have gathered, you conjure forth a terrible cyclone of wind, picking up ([\w'\-]+) and whipping (her|him) about in a frenzy.

Trigger.name: Cyclone (impatience)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.dizziness = 100 OppGainedAff("impatience") if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("asthma") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Summoning forth energy that you have gathered, you conjure forth a terrible cyclone of wind, picking up the disorientated form of ([\w'\-]+) and whipping (her|him) about in a frenzy, dashing (her|him) against any available surfaces.$

Trigger.name: Hailstone (clumsiness)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("clumsiness") if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("weariness") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) stumbles clumsily as the blow lands.$

Trigger.name: Hailstone (epilepsy)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.clumsiness < 100 and affstrack.score.clumsiness > 0 then if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("clumsiness") else affstrack.score.clumsiness = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end end affstrack.score.clumsiness = 100 OppGainedAff("epilepsy") if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("weariness") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) begins to shake uncontrollably.$

Trigger.name: Hailstone (imaptience)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.clumsiness < 100 and affstrack.score.clumsiness > 0 then if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("clumsiness") else affstrack.score.clumsiness = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end elseif affstrack.score.epilepsy < 100 and affstrack.score.epilepsy > 0 then if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("epilepsy") else affstrack.score.epilepsy = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end end OppGainedAff("impatience") if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("weariness") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^A puzzled expression crosses the face of ([\w'\-]+).$

Trigger.name: Shear (break shield)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.defs.shield = false end ak.scoreup(matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^You summon a blade of condensed air and shear cleanly through the protective shield surrounding (.*).$
^You summon a blade of wind to shear at the magical shield of (.*), but find no such barrier.$

Trigger.name: Bolt (blackout)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("blackout") tempTimer(4,[[affstrack.score.blackout = 0;ak.scoreup(]]..matches[2]..[[)]]) if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("paralysis") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Raising your hands above your head, you channel power through your earth and air channels. Focusing upon (.*), you direct your arcane might in a focused burst, bringing down lightning to smite (him|her)\.$

Trigger.name: Sylvan Rend Venoms
Trigger.script: enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE! weaponattack = weaponattack or {} if matches[2] == "claws" then table.insert(weaponattack, "your wickedly sharp claws") elseif matches[2] == "vines" then table.insert(weaponattack, "the thorny vines covering your arms") else table.insert(weaponattack, matches[2]) end if affstrack.crushedherb then currentvenoms = currentvenoms or {} currentvenoms["the thorny vines covering your arms"] = currentvenoms["the thorny vines covering your arms"] or {} table.insert(currentvenoms["the thorny vines covering your arms"], affstrack.crushedherb) table.insert(weaponattack, "the thorny vines covering your arms") end --display(weaponattack)

regexCodeList.string: ^You command the razor-edged thorny ([\w'\-]+) around you to lash out and rend the (right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm|head|torso) of .*\.$

Trigger.name: Not overcharged
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("Not overcharged")

regexCodeList.string: ^Channeling arcane power through your air and earth channels, you summon forth a burst of arcane static directed at ([\w'\-]+).$
^Channeling large quantities of arcane power through your air channel, you direct a localised explosion of pure sound at ([\w'\-]+).$
^Summoning forth power through your air and earth channels, you conjure forth a brilliant flash of light at ([\w'\-]+), who blinks rapidly.$
^Summoning forth power through your air and earth channels, you conjure forth a brilliant flash of light at ([\w'\-]+), who freezes in place.$
^Tapping into your air channel, you summon forth a vicious wind to lacerate the body of ([\w'\-]+).$
^Summoning forth energy that you have gathered, you conjure forth a terrible cyclone of wind, picking up ([\w'\-]+) and whipping (her|him) about in a frenzy.$

^Summoning forth energy that you have gathered, you conjure forth a terrible cyclone of wind, picking up the disorientated form of ([\w'\-]+) and whipping (her|him) about in a frenzy, dashing (her|him) against any available surfaces.$
^([\w'\-]+) stumbles clumsily as the blow lands.$
^([\w'\-]+) begins to shake uncontrollably.$
^A puzzled expression crosses the face of ([\w'\-]+).$

Trigger.name: Overcharged
Trigger.script: OppGainedAff("clumsiness")

regexCodeList.string: ^You have (.*) units of arcane energy stored.$

Trigger.name: Crushed Pots
Trigger.script: affstrack.crushedherb = affstrack.crushedpots[matches[2]]

regexCodeList.string: Crushing a (.*) in your hand, you absorb the remnants of natural energy stored within.

Trigger.name: Vine Wreathe Enabled
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.vinewreathe = true end --display(matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^Uttering a quiet recitation, you gesture towards ([\w'\-]+). A mass of writhing vines burst forth from the ground, grabbing hold of (his|her) form\.$

Trigger.name: Vine Wreathe Disabled
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.vinewreathe = false end

regexCodeList.string: ^The vines flailing about ([\w'\-]+)\'s form recede\.

Trigger.name: Disturbed
Trigger.script: ak.disturbed = true ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: Clouds boil into existence above you, their dark mass seething.

Trigger.name: Arcane Energy
Trigger.script: ak.ae = matches[2]+0 ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: ^You have (\d+) units of arcane energy built up\.
^You have (\d+) units of arcane energy stored\.

Trigger.name: Disturb Gone
Trigger.script: ak.disturbed = false ak.ae = 0 ak.feedback = false ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: The clouds overhead abruptly wink out of existence.
The weather here is not disturbed - you cannot redirect the feedback of your spells.

Trigger.name: Feedback
Trigger.script: ak.feedback = matches[2] ak.ae = 0 ak.scoreup(matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^Directing a sliver of power through your air and earth channels, you create a conduit between the clouds above and ([\w'\-]+)\.

Trigger.name: Hellsight
Trigger.script: local aff = "hellsight" if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff(aff) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You stare intently at ([\w'\-]+), opening [\w'\-]+ mind to the unspeakable visions that spew from the bowels of hell\.$
^(w+) claws at {his|her} eyes, fingers scrabbling frantically.$

Trigger.name: Dazzle
Trigger.script: --confusion --dizziness local aff = "confusion" local aff2 = "dizziness" if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff(aff) OppGainedAff(aff2) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You direct a dazzling ray of divine light at ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Aeon
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then aeonreset = false OppGainedAff("aeon") AeonTimer = tempTimer(15,[[aeonreset = true]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Standing the Aeon on your open palm\, you blow it lightly at ([\w'\-]+) and watch as it seems to slow [\w'\-]+ movement through the time stream\.

Trigger.name: Aeon Speed
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.defs.speed = false ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You stand an Aeon tarot on your palm\, and blow it lightly at ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Moon
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) and nextmoon and nextmoon ~= "DOPPLEGANGER" then OppGainedAff(nextmoon) else ak.occie.aura.mental = ak.occie.aura.mental + 1 end

regexCodeList.string: ^As you fling the Moon tarot at ([\w'\-]+)\, it turns an ominous\, sickly red\, before striking (her|him) in the head\.$

Trigger.name: Hierophant
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("hierophant") if ak.timers.Hiero then killTimer(ak.timers.Hiero) end ak.timers.Hiero = tempTimer(60,[[ if affstrack.score.hierophant > 0 then OppLostAff("hierophant") end killTimer(ak.timers.Hiero) ]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You quickly fling a Hierophant tarot card at ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Hierophant Used
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppLostAff("hierophant") end

regexCodeList.string: ^By the power of the Hierophant\, you command ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^You issue the command\, but ([\w'\-]+) just ignores you\.$

Trigger.name: Justice
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(multimatches[2][2]) then OppGainedAff("justice") end

regexCodeList.string: With a prayer to Miramar, the Just, you fling your tarot card at
^With a prayer to Miramar\, the Just\, you fling your tarot card at ([\w'\-]+)\. A set of scales appears above [\w'\-]+ head and one side of the scale quickly descends\. Justice will be done\.$

Trigger.name: Lovers
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("lovers") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You throw a Lovers tarot at ([\w'\-]+) and as it strikes true\, a look of utter love covers [\w'\-]+ face\.$

Trigger.name: Hangedman
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.bound = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) --8secs end

regexCodeList.string: ^You toss the Hanged Man tarot card at ([\w'\-]+) and as it reaches [\w'\-]+\, a huge mass of rope bursts out of it to entrap and hinder [\w'\-]+\.$

Trigger.name: Perspire
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("slickness") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You force ([\w'\-]+) into a state of heightened perspiring\.$

Trigger.name: Roil Nausea
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.nausea > 0 then ak.thoughtIhad("nausea") end OppGainedAff("nausea") ak.fluxcheck = "roil" ak.fluxline = matches[1] enableTrigger("Flux Enhance") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You wave a hand casually in the direction of ([\w'\-]+)\, violently roiling the liquid within [\w'\-]+ stomach\.$

Trigger.name: Roil Unkown
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("nausea") ak.fluxcheck = "roil" ak.fluxline = matches[1] enableTrigger("Flux Enhance") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You wave a hand in the direction of ([\w'\-]+) roiling the liquid that flows throughout [\w'\-]+ and disrupting [\w'\-]+ mental stability\.$

Trigger.name: Choke
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if not IsTargetted(matches[2]) then return end if affstrack.score.asthma == 100 then OppGainedAff("hallucinations") else OppGainedAff("asthma") end ak.pervasion.hitcount = ak.pervasion.hitcount + 1 ak.fluxline = matches[1] ak.fluxcheck = "choke" enableTrigger("Flux Enhance")

regexCodeList.string: ^You manifest water inside the lungs of ([\w'\-]+)\, causing [\w'\-]+ to hack and cough violently\.$

Trigger.name: Drench Weariness
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.weariness > 0 then ak.thoughtIhad("weariness") end OppGainedAff("weariness") ak.fluxline = matches[1] ak.fluxcheck = "drench" enableTrigger("Flux Enhance") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You call down a deluge to drench the impudent ([\w'\-]+)\, soaking [\w'\-]+ with icy water\.$

Trigger.name: Drench Confusion
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("weariness") OppGainedAff("confusion") end ak.fluxline = matches[1] ak.fluxcheck = "drench" enableTrigger("Flux Enhance")

regexCodeList.string: ^You call down a deluge to drench the impudent ([\w'\-]+)\, leaving [\w'\-]+ dazed and confused\.$

Trigger.name: Parch
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("Lethargy") end ak.fluxline = matches[1] ak.fluxcheck = "parch" enableTrigger("Flux Enhance")

regexCodeList.string: ^You leech the water from ([\w'\-]+)\, making [\w'\-]+ skin dry and cracked\.$

Trigger.name: Thin
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.haemophilia > 0 then ak.thoughtIhad("haemophilia") end OppGainedAff("haemophilia") ak.pervasion.initialbleed = false end

regexCodeList.string: ^You exert your limited control of the blood that flows through the veins of ([\w'\-]+)\, thinning it\.$

Trigger.name: Thin
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("haemophilia") ak.pervasion.initialbleed = true end

regexCodeList.string: ^You violently pull on the thinned blood flowing through the inferior form of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Level 1
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end

regexCodeList.string: ^Tendrils of water lash out from you\, latching themselves to ([\w'\-]+) and hindering [\w'\-]+ attempts to flee\.$

Trigger.name: Latch 2
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end

regexCodeList.string: ^You reach for the blood that flows through the inferior form of ([\w'\-]+)\, latching on and drawing it out\.$

Trigger.name: Latch 3
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.latched = 300 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^With an exertion of will\, you reach past flesh and viscera\, seizing control of every drop of water that flows throughout the walking corpse that is ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Latch Cure
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.latched = 0 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Colour floods back into the face of ([\w'\-]+)\, [\w'\-]+ unhealthy pallor a thing of the past\.$
^You have not taken dominion over the water that flows through ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^You reach for the water that courses throughout ([\w'\-]+)\, but it slips through your grasp like smoke\.$

Trigger.name: Parch
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then --cecho("<cyan>Flux: <white>"..ak.fluxcheck) if affstrack.score.haemophilia ~= 100 then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("haemophilia") affstrack.score.weariness = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) else ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("weariness") end OppGainedAff("addiction") end disableTrigger("Flux Enhance")

regexCodeList.string: ^A ravenous gleam enters the eyes of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Roil
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then --cecho("<cyan>Flux: <white>"..ak.fluxcheck) if affstrack.score.weariness ~= 100 then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("asthma") affstrack.score.weariness = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) else ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("weariness") end OppGainedAff("anorexia") end disableTrigger("Flux Enhance")

regexCodeList.string: ^The skin of ([\w'\-]+) takes on a green tinge\.$

Trigger.name: Drench
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then --cecho("<cyan>Flux: <white>"..ak.fluxcheck) if affstrack.score.asthma ~= 100 then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("asthma") affstrack.score.slickness = 100 affstrack.score.anorexia = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) elseif affstrack.score.slickness ~= 100 then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("slickness") affstrack.score.anorexia = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) else ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("anorexia") end end disableTrigger("Flux Enhance")

regexCodeList.string: ^Tendrils of water writhe and burrow into the eyes and nose of ([\w'\-]+)\, seeking and questing\.$

Trigger.name: Choke
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then --cecho("<cyan>Flux: <white>"..ak.fluxcheck) if affstrack.score.nausea ~= 100 then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("nausea") affstrack.score.weariness = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) elseif affstrack.score.weariness ~= 100 then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("weariness") end end disableTrigger("Flux Enhance")

regexCodeList.string: ^The head of a servant of Sllshya erupts from your chest\, its fangs sinking into the exposed throat of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: No Flux Finish

regexCodeList.string: ^You force ([\w'\-]+) into a state of heightened perspiring\.$
^You wave a hand casually in the direction of ([\w'\-]+)\, violently roiling the liquid within [\w'\-]+ stomach\.$
^You wave a hand in the direction of ([\w'\-]+) roiling the liquid that flows throughout [\w'\-]+ and disrupting [\w'\-]+ mental stability\.$
^You manifest water inside the lungs of ([\w'\-]+)\, causing [\w'\-]+ to hack and cough violently\.$
^You call down a deluge to drench the impudent ([\w'\-]+)\, soaking [\w'\-]+ with icy water\.$
^You call down a deluge to drench the impudent ([\w'\-]+)\, leaving [\w'\-]+ dazed and confused\.$
^You leech the water from ([\w'\-]+)\, making [\w'\-]+ skin dry and cracked\.$
^You exert your limited control of the blood that flows through the veins of ([\w'\-]+)\, thinning it\.$
^You violently pull on the thinned blood flowing through the inferior form of ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^Tendrils of water lash out from you\, latching themselves to ([\w'\-]+) and hindering [\w'\-]+ attempts to flee\.$
^You reach for the blood that flows through the inferior form of ([\w'\-]+)\, latching on and drawing it out\.$
^With an exertion of will\, you reach passed flesh and viscera\, seizing control of every drop of water that flows throughout the walking corpse that is ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Non-Fluxed Attack
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.fluxcheck = false disableTrigger("Flux Enhance")

Trigger.name: Downpour
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("frozen") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Water thunders down upon ([\w'\-]+)\, leaving [\w'\-]+ shivering beneath its chill\.$

Trigger.name: Wreck
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("stupidity recklessness") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Bringing forth a spinning cyclone of water\, you pick up ([\w'\-]+) in it and repeatedly dash [\w'\-]+ against the ground\.$

Trigger.name: Torrent

Trigger.name: Applied
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if gmcp and gmcp.Char and gmcp.Char.Vitals and gmcp.Char.Vitals.charstats[3] and gmcp.Char.Vitals.charstats[3] == "Spec: Two Handed" then send("battlefury perceive "..target) end --if ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]] > 5 then --ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]] = ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]] - 2 --cecho("<yellow>"..ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]..":<cyan> "..ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]]) --else ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]] = ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]] - 1 if ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]] < 0 then ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]] = 0 end cecho("<yellow>"..ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]..":<cyan> "..ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]]) --end if matches[3] == "legs" then ak.tendonHit() elseif matches[3] == "arms" then ak.wristHit() elseif matches[3] == "head" then ak.skullHit() elseif matches[3] == "torso" then ak.ribHit() end ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end --legs,arms,head,torso

if ak.limbs.shikudoParse then ak.limbs.shikudoParse() end

Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if not IsTargetted(matches[2]) then return end affs = {} ocured = ocured or {} ocured[ocured.conversion["rage"]] = {} ak.occie.aura.parsereduct("rage") for i = 1, #affstrack.eaten["rage"] do if affstrack.score[affstrack.eaten["rage"][i]] > 0 then table.insert(affs, affstrack.eaten["rage"][i]) end end if #affs > 0 then ak.echoForPossibleCures(table.concat(affs, " ")) for i = 1, #affs do ocured[ocured.conversion["rage"]][affs[i]] = affstrack.score[affs[i]] affstrack.score[affs[i]] = affstrack.score[affs[i]] - affstrack.score[affs[i]] / #affs if affstrack.score[affs[i]] < ak.errorallowance then affstrack.score[affs[i]] = 0 end end end ak.scoreup(matches[2])

Trigger.name: Serverside Alias Setting
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "dor" then return end affstrack.overcharge = false
local cursedraw = matches[3]:lower() cursedraw = string.gsub(cursedraw, "/", " ")
cursedraw = cursedraw:split(" ") for k,v in pairs(cursedraw) do if string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"overcharge") then affstrack.overcharge = true elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"relapse") then invoked = cursedraw[k+1] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"invoke") then invoked = cursedraw[k+2] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"impurity") then nextcurse = cursedraw[k+1] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"instill") then nextinstill = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"moon") then nextmoon = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"deadeyes") then nextcurse = cursedraw[k+2] nextcurse2 = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"imbibe") then imbibedraw = cursedraw[k+1] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"truewrack") then alchemisttruewrack = cursedraw[k+2] alchemisttruewracktwo = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"wrack") then alchemistwrack = cursedraw[k+2] end end if table.contains(cursedraw,"combo") and ak.MonkType() ~= "Tekura" then ak.shikudo.AliasSplit(cursedraw) end

regexCodeList.string: Alias \"([\w'\-]+)\" will now execute\: \"(.*)\"

Trigger.name: Ran Off SS Split
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "OATTACK" then ak.queue.eqbal = {} ak.queue.sent = {} return end
local cursedraw = matches[2]:lower() cursedraw = string.gsub(cursedraw, "|", " ")
cursedraw = cursedraw:split(" ") for k,v in pairs(cursedraw) do if string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"overcharge") then affstrack.overcharge = true elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"relapse") then invoked = cursedraw[k+1] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"invoke") then invoked = cursedraw[k+2] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"impurity") then nextcurse = cursedraw[k+1] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"instill") then nextinstill = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"moon") then nextmoon = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"deadeyes") then nextcurse = cursedraw[k+2] nextcurse2 = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"imbibe") then imbibedraw = cursedraw[k+1] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"truewrack") then alchemisttruewrack = cursedraw[k+2] alchemisttruewracktwo = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"wrack") then alchemistwrack = cursedraw[k+2] end end if table.contains(cursedraw,"combo") and ak.MonkType() ~= "Tekura" then ak.shikudo.AliasSplit(cursedraw) end

Trigger.name: Class Changed(gmcp)

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) lets out a great keening\, casting the impurities from (?:her|his) form\.$
^([\w'\-]+)\'s eyes begin to blaze dangerously\.$
^([\w'\-]+) completes [\w'\-]+ transformation and\, with an ear\-splitting roar\, throws back [\w'\-]+ draconic head and screams out [\w'\-]+ triumph\.$
^([\w'\-]+) growls almost inaudibly\.$

^With a low rumbling from deep within [\w'\-]+ belly\, ([\w'\-]+) utters a guttural chant\. [\w'\-]+ skin ripples as a web of crackling magical energy dances like fire across its surface\, settling to solidify into a flexible\, translucent shell\.$
^([\w'\-]+) lunges at ([\w'\-]+) with long\, flashing ([\w'\-]+) extended\, tearing into (his|her) (right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm|head|torso) ruthlessly\.$
^([\w'\-]+) lunges forward with long\, flashing ([\w'\-]+) extended\, tearing down to the bones of your (right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm|head|torso)\.$
^Gritting [\w'\-]+ glistening teeth into a rictus grin\, ([\w'\-]+) emits a low rumble as [\w'\-]+ flexes [\w'\-]+ rippling muscles\.$
^([\w'\-]+) turns to fix [\w'\-]+ gaze upon you\, and you feel your heart increase its palpitations as a low keening echoes from [\w'\-]+ throat\.$
^Drawing an enormous breath\, ([\w'\-]+) exhales\, expelling a gale of wind with such force that you are knocked over\.$
^([\w'\-]+) fixes [\w'\-]+ gaze upon [\w'\-]+\, swaying slowly as [\w'\-]+ begins a low keening\.$
^Drawing an enormous breath\, ([\w'\-]+) exhales\, expelling a gale of wind with such force that [\w'\-]+ is knocked over\.$
^([\w'\-]+) crushes [\w'\-]+ between [\w'\-]+ massive jaws\, jerking [\w'\-]+ back and forth like a rag doll\.$
^([\w'\-]+) snaps [\w'\-]+ massive jaws close around you\, jerking you back and forth with agonising strength\.$
^([\w'\-]+)'s powerful chest expands as [\w'\-]+ takes a mighty breath\, loosing a shrill volley of [\w'\-]+\-infused vapour into the air\.$
^An ominous feeling descends upon you as ([\w'\-]+) turns [\w'\-]+ gaze upon you\.$

^([\w'\-]+)\'s nostrils flare wildly with a great rush of air as [\w'\-]+ sinuous body contracts and [\w'\-]+ mouth opens wide to emit a rippling\, unbroken roar that reverberates through your body and blasts your eardrums into oblivion\.$
^([\w'\-]+) draws himself up to [\w'\-]+ full height\, staring imperiously down at [\w'\-]+\.$
^([\w'\-]+)\'s nostrils flare wildly with a great rush of air as [\w'\-]+ sinuous body contracts and [\w'\-]+ mouth opens wide to emit a rippling\, unbroken roar at ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^([\w'\-]+) rips into [\w'\-]+ with [\w'\-]+ massive\, deadly claws\.$
^Lunging forward with long\, flashing claws extended\, ([\w'\-]+) tears into [\w'\-]+ ruthlessly\.$
^A deathly calm descends upon your surroundings as ([\w'\-]+) draws himself up regally\, eyes gleaming with murderous intent\.$

^([\w'\-]+) rises back on [\w'\-]+ hind legs\, more than doubling in height as [\w'\-]+ towers above you\. The groundshakes violently as [\w'\-]+ slams [\w'\-]+ feet back down\, recklessly crushing everyone in [\w'\-]+ path\.$
^([\w'\-]+)\'s tail narrowly misses you as it whips in a circle\.$
^You are knocked forcefully off your feet by the impact of ([\w'\-]+)\'s huge tail\.$
^[\w'\-]+ is knocked forcefully off [\w'\-]+ feet by the impact of ([\w'\-]+)\'s huge tail\.$
^Your body trembles as ([\w'\-]+) invokes a dramatic chant in the dragon tongue\. As [\w'\-]+ voice resonates\, you are assailed by a wave of magical energy that threatens to tear your skin apart\.$

^A resonant vibration emanates from ([\w'\-]+) as [\w'\-]+ invokes a rumbling\, sonorous chant in the dragon tongue\. As the sound increases\, ([\w'\-]+) jerks violently\, [\w'\-]+ body wracked by an unseen force\.$
^[\w'\-]+\'s form seems suddenly weighted down as ([\w'\-]+) lays the ancient Dragoncurse upon [\w'\-]+\.$
^A heavy burden descends upon your soul as ([\w'\-]+) lays the ancient Dragoncurse upon you\.$
^([\w'\-]+) whips [\w'\-]+ tail around\, striking the wall to the [\w'\-]+ with a powerful blow\. A network of fine fractures spreads over its surface before it suddenly collapses\.$
^([\w'\-]+) whips [\w'\-]+ tail around\, spinning in a wild circle\, in what you can only assume to be some draconic mating ritual\.$
^([\w'\-]+)\'s great form shudders briefly\.$
^([\w'\-]+) flicks [\w'\-]+ tail at you\, effortlessly shattering your magical shield\.$
^([\w'\-]+) dismissively flicks [\w'\-]+ tail at [\w'\-]+\, annihilating the magical shield surrounding [\w'\-]+ with casual ease\.$

Trigger.name: Alertness (Achaea+Imperian)
Trigger.script:
mmp.alertness = mmp.alertness or {} local alertness = mmp.alertness
local roomexists, getRoomName, anytolong, matches, deleteLine = mmp.roomexists, getRoomName, mmp.anytolong, matches, deleteLine
if mmp.debug then mmp.alertnessTime = mmp.alertnessTime or createStopWatch() startStopWatch(mmp.alertnessTime) end
if matches[4] ~= "location" then local longexitname = matches[4] alertness[longexitname] = alertness[longexitname] or {} alertness[longexitname][#alertness[longexitname]+1] = matches[2] deleteLine() elseif matches[4] == "location" then local currentroomname = mmp.cleanroomname(mmp.currentroomname) if matches[3] == currentroomname then alertness.here = alertness.here or {} alertness.here[#alertness.here+1] = matches[2] deleteLine() end end
if not mmp.firstAlert then mmp.firstAlert = true mmp.pdb_lastupdate = {} end
mmp.pdb[matches[2]] = matches[3] mmp.pdb_lastupdate[matches[2]] = true
enableTrigger"Mudlet Mapper prompt trigger"
if mmp.debug then mmp.echo("alertness trigger for "..matches[2].." took "..stopStopWatch(mmp.alertnessTime).."s.") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your enhanced senses inform you that (\w+) has entered (.+?)(?:, to the| at your) (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Mudlet Mapper prompt trigger
Trigger.script:
-- to be enabled by functions that need it and disabled after it's done. Sort of like a cheap prompttrigger from Svo. mmp.firstAlert = false -- handle alertness if mmp.alertness and next(mmp.alertness) then
local dirs = {} for direction, _ in pairs(mmp.alertness) do dirs[#dirs+1] = direction end local people = select(2, next(mmp.alertness)) or {}
moveCursor(0, getLineNumber())
if ndb then local getcolor = ndb.getcolor for i = 1, #people do people[i] = getcolor(people[i])..people[i] end end
cinsertText("<red>[<cyan>" .. table.concat(dirs, ', ') .. " <red>-"..(#dirs > 1 and ("\n ") or '').." <white>" .. ((svo and svo.concatand) and svo.concatand(people) or table.concat(people, ', ')) .. "<cyan> ("..#people..")<red>]\n")
moveCursorEnd()
mmp.alertness = nil
raiseEvent("mmapper updated pdb") end
-- reset names we last seen, so scripts can be efficient -- not finished yet --if next(mmp.pdb_lastupdate) then -- mmp.pdb_lastupdate = {} --end
disableTrigger"Mudlet Mapper prompt trigger"

Trigger.name: No wormhole
Trigger.script:
if mmp.speedWalkDir and mmp.speedWalkDir[speedWalkCounter] and mmp.speedWalkDir[speedWalkCounter]=="worm warp" then mmp.echo("Missing wormhole detected, locking wormhole and trying new path...")
lockSpecialExit(mmp.currentroom, mmp.speedWalkPath[speedWalkCounter], "worm warp", true)
local destination = mmp.speedWalkPath[#mmp.speedWalkPath]
mmp.stop()
mmp.clearpathcache() -- clear cache so mmp.getPath accounts for the new way
if not mmp.getPath(mmp.currentroom, destination) then mmp.echo(string.format("Don't know how to get to %d (%s) anymore :( Move into a room we know of to continue", destination, getRoomName(destination))) else mmp.gotoRoom(destination) end end

Trigger.name: Got line
Trigger.script:
--deleteLine()
selectString(line, 1) replace""
-- get the name cecho("<green>"..matches[2].."<reset>: ")
-- ids mmp.echonums(matches[3])
-- pad spaces so we have aligned roomname echo(string.rep(" ", 25 - #getCurrentLine()))
-- and finally, the roomname echo(matches[3])
if mmp.tempscent[matches[3]] then mmp.tempscent[matches[3]][#mmp.tempscent[matches[3]]+1] = matches[2] else mmp.tempscent[matches[3]] = {matches[2]} end
-- save in our person tracking db mmp.pdb[matches[2]] = matches[3] mmp.pdb_lastupdate[matches[2]] = true

Trigger.name: Got line
Trigger.script:
local person, room = matches[2], matches[3]:trim()
selectString(line, 1) replace""
-- get the name cecho("<green>"..person.."<reset>: ")
-- ids --mmp.echonums()
-- pad spaces so we have aligned roomname echo(string.rep(" ", 13 - #getCurrentLine()))
-- and finally, the roomname echo(room)
mmp.locateAndEchoSide(room, person)
if mmp.tempscent[room] then mmp.tempscent[room][#mmp.tempscent[room]+1] = person else mmp.tempscent[room] = {person} end
-- save in our person tracking db mmp.pdb[person] = room mmp.pdb_lastupdate[person] = true

Trigger.name: Stop capturing
Trigger.script:
setTriggerStayOpen("mmp Lusternia kaleidoscope", 0)
--[[for area, names in pairs(mmp.tempscent) do for _, name in ipairs(names) do
-- get the name cecho("\n<green>"..name.."<reset>: ")
-- ids mmp.echonums(area)
-- pad spaces so we have aligned roomname echo(string.rep(" ", 25))
-- and finally, the roomname echo(area) end end]]
raiseEvent("mmapper updated pdb")
